title: Online Collaborative Project-Based Social Problem-Solving Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and collaborative project experience
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term program for undergraduate students in medical, legal, and technical professions, conducting practice-oriented projects linked to social issues through online collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can establish team project plans in groups of four using online collaboration tools
Learners can derive solutions to social issues by applying a role division system (planner, developer, tester, presenter).
Learners can document their problem-solving experiences during real-time collaboration in a reflective journal and incorporate feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
